derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English sala, from Old Norse sala, of Germanic origin; related to sell

encyclopedia.content: SALE sale作为英文名词 n. 可以解释为： 1. 卖，出售 2. 销售业务；营业；推销 3. 销售额 4. 销路 5. 廉价出售 锛堄戎讣窘谛曰虼婊醯娘級 6. 拍卖 动词形式：sell SALE最早出现在中国只是在一些一线城市及开放性城市的零售业使用，当前随着经济商业化进程的发展及全民英文水平的提升，这种商业特定代名词已被频繁的使用在换季及折扣季的商超、百货零售业态中，商家可通过SALE简单的几个字母在橱窗及其显要的视觉化角度，利用常识

entry.def: The sale of goods is the act of selling them for money.

example.ex: Efforts were made to limit the sale of alcohol.
example.tran: 过去曾采取措施限制酒的销售。

example.ex: ...a proposed arms sale to Saudi Arabia...
example.tran: 拟议对沙特阿拉伯出售武器

entry.def: The sales of a product are the quantity of it that is sold.

example.ex: The newspaper has sales of 1.72 million.
example.tran: 该报纸有 172 万份的销量。

example.ex: ...the huge Christmas sales of computer games.
example.tran: 电脑游戏在圣诞期间的巨额销量

entry.def: The part of a company that deals with sales deals with selling the company's products.

example.ex: Until 1983 he worked in sales and marketing...
example.tran: 1983 年之前，他一直在市场营销部工作。

example.ex: She was their Dusseldorf sales manager.
example.tran: 她是他们驻杜塞尔多夫的销售部经理。

entry.def: A sale is an occasion when a shop sells things at less than their normal price.

example.ex: ...a pair of jeans bought half-price in a sale...
example.tran: 打折时半价买的一条牛仔裤

example.ex: Many stores have started their January sales a month early.
example.tran: 许多商店提前一个月就开始了一月份的特价促销活动。

entry.def: A sale is an event when goods are sold to the person who offers the highest price.

example.ex: The painting was bought by dealers at the Christie's sale.
example.tran: 这幅油画在佳士得的拍卖会上被交易商拍走。

entry.def: If something is for sale, it is being offered to people to buy.

example.ex: His former home is for sale at £495,000...
example.tran: 他的旧居要以 49.5 万英镑的价格出售。

example.ex: There was a Leica camera for sale in the window...
example.tran: 橱窗里有架莱卡相机待售。

entry.def: Products that are on sale can be bought in shops.

example.ex: English textbooks and dictionaries are on sale everywhere...
example.tran: 英语教材和词典到处都有卖的。

example.ex: All tickets go on sale this Friday.
example.tran: 所有票在本星期五开始销售。

entry.def: If products in a shop are on sale, they can be bought for less than their normal price.

example.ex: He bought a sports jacket on sale at Gowings Men's Store.
example.tran: 他在高英斯男装店买了一件打折的运动上衣。

entry.def: If a property or company is up for sale, its owner is trying to sell it.

example.ex: The castle has been put up for sale.

sentences.sentence: "he has just made his first sale"
"they had to complete the sale before the banks closed"

means.word_mean: 3. the state of being purchasable; offered or exhibited for selling;

sentences.sentence: "you'll find vitamin C for sale at most pharmacies"
"the new line of cars will soon be on sale"

means.word_mean: 4. an occasion (usually brief) for buying at specially reduced prices;

sentences.sentence: "they held a sale to reduce their inventory"
"I got some great bargains at their annual sale"

means.word_mean: 5. an agreement (or contract) in which property is transferred from the seller (vendor) to the buyer (vendee) for a fixed price in money (paid or agreed to be paid by the buyer);

sentences.sentence: "the salesman faxed the sales agreement to his home office"

auth_sentence.res_content: Most senior communities have homes for sale or rent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most senior communities have homes for sale or rent.

auth_sentence.res_content: The sale process is being handled by CBRE Hotels.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sale process is being handled by CBRE Hotels.

auth_sentence.content: Most countries have banned the sale of irradiated food.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most countries have banned the sale of irradiated food.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most countries have banned the sale of irradiated food.

Sentence.sentence: Why did you sales people accept them?

Of the produce that does appear in the supermarket, commonly used sales promotions frequently encourage customers to purchase excessive quantities which, in the case of perishable foodstuffs, inevitably generate wastage in the home.
They were obliged to work more hours to increase their sales

sentences.en: He got 100 from the sale of his bike.
sentences.cn: 他将自行车卖掉, 得了100美元。

sentences.en: My agent arranged the sale of the house.
sentences.cn: 我的代理人对房子的出售作了安排。

sentences.en: This store always has a marvellous New Year's sale.
sentences.cn: 这家商店新年前后销售情况极好。

sentences.en: This shirt was a bargain — only ￡15 in a sale.
sentences.cn: 这件衬衫是便宜货, 大减价时只卖十五英镑。

sentences.en: They bought a lot of sale goods yesterday.
sentences.cn: 他们昨天买了许多廉价货。

sentences.en: There's no sale for cotton dresses in the autumn.
sentences.cn: 在秋季, 棉布服装没有销路。

jushi.english: I haven't made a sale all week.
jushi.chinese: 我整个星期没有卖出东西。

jushi.english: Sales of electric heaters have increased.
jushi.chinese: 电暖器的销售量增加了。

jushi.english: Our school is having a book sale next week.
jushi.chinese: 我校下星期将进行图书廉价出售。
